successes.title: Bunch O Balloons: 100 Water Balloons in Less Than 1 Minute
successes.description: Fill and tie hundreds of water balloons in minutes with our attachment that comes ready-to-go, no preparation necessary!

WHOLESALER PACKAGE: 1000 balloons plus $500 credit on the first wholesale (post-Kickstarter) order. Reserve your spot and be the first retailer in your area to carry Bunch O Balloons. Available to business backers only.
